column4: Is it worth running a 64 bit Linux OS on a Server with only 3 GIG of Ram? The process supports 64 Bit/VT but I wasn't for sure if its like in the Windows world that you won't really see any benefits? Does the Linux Kernel really take advantage of 64bit in a noticable difference compared to running it on the same hardware in 32bit?
depends on what you run on it
64bit CPU's also have math extensions, so I'd assume you'd probably get at least some benefit out of it
